general-synopsis.gs-text: Atlantic low 969 expected just west of Rockall 975 by 0600 Thursday. New low expected shetland 996 by same time

area-forecast.all: Viking, North Utsire, South Utsire, Northeast Forties
area-forecast.wind: Southeasterly 4 to 6, becoming cyclonic 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 in South Utsire.
area-forecast.visibility: Moderate or good, occasionally very poor later in Viking
area-forecast.weather: Rain, fog patches later in Viking.
